Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

NetworkAdapterMetrics.description: The NetworkAdapterMetrics schema contains usage and health statistics for a network adapter.
NetworkAdapterMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall represent the network metrics for a single network adapter in a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

CPUCorePercent.description: The device CPU core utilization as a percentage.
CPUCorePercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the device CPU core utilization as a percentage.

HostBusRXPercent.description: The host bus, such as PCIe, RX utilization as a percentage.
HostBusRXPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the host bus, such as PCIe, RX utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the total bytes received by the theoretical max.

HostBusTXPercent.description: The host bus, such as PCIe, TX utilization as a percentage.
HostBusTXPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the host bus, such as PCIe, TX utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the total bytes transmitted by the theoretical max.

NCSIRXBytes.description: The total number of NC-SI bytes received since reset.
NCSIRXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of NC-SI bytes received since reset, including both passthrough and non-passthrough traffic.

NCSIRXFrames.description: The total number of NC-SI frames received since reset.
NCSIRXFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of NC-SI frames received since reset, including both passthrough and non-passthrough traffic.

NCSITXBytes.description: The total number of NC-SI bytes sent since reset.
NCSITXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of NC-SI bytes sent since reset, including both passthrough and non-passthrough traffic.

NCSITXFrames.description: The total number of NC-SI frames sent since reset.
NCSITXFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of NC-SI frames sent since reset, including both passthrough and non-passthrough traffic.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RXBytes.description: The total number of bytes received since reset.
RXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of bytes received since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic, and inclusive of all protocol overhead.

RXMulticastFrames.description: The total number of good multicast frames received since reset.
RXMulticastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good multicast frames received since reset.

RXUnicastFrames.description: The total number of good unicast frames received since reset.
RXUnicastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good unicast frames received since reset.

TXBytes.description: The total number of bytes transmitted since reset.
TXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of bytes transmitted since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic, and inclusive of all protocol overhead.

TXMulticastFrames.description: The total number of good multicast frames transmitted since reset.
TXMulticastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good multicast frames transmitted since reset.

TXUnicastFrames.description: The total number of good unicast frames transmitted since reset.
TXUnicastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good unicast frames transmitted since reset.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #NetworkAdapterMetrics.v1_0_0.NetworkAdapterMetrics
